page.title: 16LOCAL MEDIA SERVING CLATFORD
page.content: THE ANDOVER ADVERTISER is one of our local {MEDIA}.The paper has been going for a 128 years. It started as a monthly paper by Russell Fox. In 1876 the Holmes family took the paper over it then had 8 pages. Now it is a weekly paper costing 18p. It prints 16,200 copies a week they{EMPLOY} 29 people and has 20 {PAGES}. ECHO started 130 years ago. It is now owned by the Southern{NEWSPAPERS} costing 15p. It prints 10,000 a day and employs 512 people. It has 60 pages and is very popular. AVON ADVERTISER started 7 years ago. It is now owned by the southern newspapers costing nothing. It prints 9,800 a week and employs 25 people and has 36 pages.
